```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

## Data


```{r}
read_lines("input/09") |> 
  str_split(pattern = '') |>
  map(as.integer) |> 
  enframe(name = "Y") |>
  unnest_longer(value) |> 
  group_by(Y) |> 
  mutate(X = row_number()) |> 
  ggplot(aes(X, Y, fill = value)) +
  geom_raster() +
  scale_fill_viridis_c(option = "A", direction = -1L) +
  theme_void()
ggsave("d09.png", width = 5, height = 5)
  
```
